_moving on_

**[rctapi](https://adlcruz.github.io/rctapi/) + [rctexplorer](https://adlcruz.github.io/rctexplorer/) for R based interaction with the clinicaltrials.gov online database**
Use these two to search filter and download records from the website and load data to an app for interactive visualisation. Feel free to use/copy/improve on the [source code](https://github.com/AdlCruz/rctapi).

[Project report and use-case](assets/deanonlshtmdiss.pdf) \
